about_the_game:
Support us on Kickstarter!

Steam no longer allows us to share links on our store page, but you can find a link to our Kickstarter in the article above (titled Kickstarter Live) or directly in our game from the main menu!

Sorry for the inconveience, and thanks for your support!

Welcome to the Seven Seas: Adventures!

Seven Seas: Adventures is a Sandbox RPG set during the golden age of sail & piracy where you will to set out and chart your own course, working to leave your impact on the world! With over 100 unique characters in 9 historial factions - each with their own goals, relationships, and play styles - you will meet merchants, military fleets, government officials, and yes... even pirates!

Sail around the entire Caribbean and visit 37 unique ports, with their own facilities, markets, and government buildings

PLAY YOUR WAY!

Seven Seas: Adventures is an open-world sandbox game, where there are no classes or gameplay limitations - become a merchant, become a pirate... or become a merchant pirate! Don't know how to swim and have an intense fear of water? It's weird that you're reading this, but we got you! Become an industrialist, own commodity producing facilities and never even think about stepping foot on a boat!

The choice is ultimately yours, and each playthrough is guaranteed to be different from the last!

FACTIONS

Create your very own Faction and Interact with 9 historical Factions that were present during the Age of Sail, form alliances, declare war, and conquer the New World through naval combat and port sieges.

As you conquer ports and influence characters to join your faction, you will slowly eliminate other factions from the new world until you achieve total dominance!

BUILD A POWERFUL FLEET

Build and maintain a fleet of powerful ships, ranging from a humble Sloop to a towering Ship of the Line! Arm your ships with cannons and load them with special ammo types to ensure you're the most powerful captain on the Seven Seas!

COMBAT

Whether you're protecting your fleet from pirates or being a pirate yourself - combat is a key aspect of Seven Seas: Adventures! You can auto-resolve battles or play them in their live and realtime wood-shattering glory!

Take direct and completely control of your ships - steer them, adjust the sails, and order your cannoneers to fire! Dynamically swap between ships while in combat to ensure victory - your entire fleet will be engaged in battle!

But not every ship need be sunk! Board your enemies vessels where crew will battle it out for ultimate control!

After a battle is complete, regardless if you're the aggressor or victim - winning battles will earn you spoils of both gold and commodities and will teach anyone who would wrong you... that's it's probably not a good idea!

But be warned, if you lose in battle, you will lose your ships, goods, and a portion of your gold! So make sure to keep some gold in the bank to ensure you can get back on your feet!

ECONOMY

Seven Seas: Adventures is a very economy-driven game, ports produce commodities which are then consumed to either produce better goods, or just serve as trading goods to trade between ports! In total, players can trade over 30 different commodities!

Find great deals at ports all over the world - or listen in on gossip in the Taverns and Churches to know when goods will be plentiful, scarce, and even contraband!

After you've purchased your wares, sail around the world, or follow gossip to find ports that'll offer you the highest profits! Or, take a risk and attempt to smuggle items into ports where your wares are considered contraband...

But more than this, players can even own the very means of production and invest in businesses to produce commodities for profit, or to feed their better industrial factories!

PLAY ONLINE

Play with your friends in private servers, both over LAN or the Internet - or join public servers with players all over the world in a large scale, constantly evolving game - where the full game is accessible!

A WORLD FILLED WITH ACTIVITIES

In Seven Seas: Adventures, there will be limitless activities for you and your friends to do - hunt pirates and collect bounties, solve puzzles to find hidden treasure, and even visit the tavern to play a few games of Blackjack in the Tavern!

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 650 or equivalent

  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is optional and not required
